name: Broadcast Interactive Media
overview: Broadcast Interactive Media, LLC provides Web solutions for television, radio, and newspaper Websites in the United States. Its products include BIMVID, an integrated video platform that provides capture of broadcast video, a Web-based editor and publishing system, and configurable players that interact with DART and other advertisements trafficking tools; and YouNews that allows audience to upload video and photo stories in various categories, such as local weather, news, and events to their local media Website. The company offers development, editorial, advertising, search engine optimization, search engine marketing, Web and video content management system, and Website integration services. Broadcast Interactive Media, LLC also offers site hosting options, revenue-generating programs and national sales support, advertising and content network operations, and technology development services. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Madison, Wisconsin with additional offices in New York, New York; and Madison, Wisconsin.
